SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.handlers

Class CollisionHandlerTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.handlers.CollisionHandlerTest
class CollisionHandlerTest extends Object
Test class for the CollisionHandler.

This class contains unit tests for the CollisionHandler class, which handles various collision scenarios in the game, such as plane collisions, projectile collisions, and powerup collisions.

  • Constructor Details

    • CollisionHandlerTest

      CollisionHandlerTest()

  • Method Details

    • initJFX

      @BeforeAll public static void initJFX()
      Initializes the JavaFX platform for testing.

    • testHandlePlaneCollisions

      @Test void testHandlePlaneCollisions()
      Tests the handling of plane collisions.

      This test verifies that when a friendly plane collides with an enemy plane, the friendly plane's health is reduced, and the enemy plane is destroyed.

    • testHandleUserProjectileCollisions

      @Test void testHandleUserProjectileCollisions()
      Tests the handling of user projectile collisions.

      This test verifies that when a user projectile collides with an enemy plane, both the projectile and the enemy plane are destroyed.

    • testHandleEnemyProjectileCollisions

      @Test void testHandleEnemyProjectileCollisions()
      Tests the handling of enemy projectile collisions.

      This test verifies that when an enemy projectile collides with a friendly plane, the projectile is destroyed, and the friendly plane's health is reduced.

    • testHandleEnemyPenetration

      @Test void testHandleEnemyPenetration()
      Tests the handling of enemy penetration.

      This test verifies that when an enemy plane penetrates the screen boundary, it is destroyed.

    • testHandlePowerupCollisions

      @Test void testHandlePowerupCollisions()
      Tests the handling of powerup collisions.

      This test verifies that when a user plane collides with a powerup, the powerup is destroyed.
